components.name: cholinium propanoate
sample: 0.01 water mass %(dried by vacuum heating;solvent extraction)

title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature

ref.full: Fernandez, L.; Silva, L. P.; Martins, M. A. R.; Ferreira, O.; Ortega, J.; Pinho, S. P.; Coutinho, J. A. P. (2017) Fluid Phase Equilib. 448, 9-14.
ref.title: Indirect assessment of the fusion properties of choline chloride from solid-liquid equilibria data
